detailed_profile.name: Lokesh Grover
detailed_profile.city: Abu Dhabi Emirate, United Arab Emirates
detailed_profile.position: Helping Food Business Owners to Grow Income with Better Customer Experience & Sustainability | Founder & CEO at CanteenPOS
detailed_profile.about: Technology Advisor with 22+ years of experience,I transitioned my passion for innovation into CanteenPOS (founded 2024). CanteenPOS is a cloud-based solution designed to tackle critical issues in the food service industry: - Reducing Food Waste: We empower schools, restaurants, and cafes to minimize food waste through innovative tools and insights. - Automating Operations: Our technology streamlines daily tasks, freeing up staff time and resources for growth initiatives. - Boosting Revenue: CanteenPOS empowers businesses to increase efficiency and customer satisfaction, ultimately leading to higher revenue. Driven by a passion for automation, sustainability, convenience, and food safety, I'm dedicated to helping businesses thrive in today's competitive landscape. Currently seeking: Business owners who want to leverage the power of CanteenPOS's cloud billing solution to streamline operations, reduce theft, and achieve significant revenue growth. Connect with me if you're ready to unlock the full potential of your food service business.

experience.title: Project Manager
experience.description: - Spearheaded end-to-end development and deployment of Fleet Management and Warehouse Management Systems, optimizing logistics operations and enhancing efficiency.- Led process automation initiatives, streamlining workflows and improving turnaround times across the logistics arm (CFS).- Managed the successful implementation of Oracle Fusion for enterprise resource planning, ensuring seamless integration and operational consistency.- Oversaw innovative technology projects, aligning with organizational goals to achieve significant operational cost savings and efficiency improvements.- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver cutting-edge solutions in logistics and supply chain management, driving measurable results.
experience.description_html:
- Spearheaded end-to-end development and deployment of Fleet Management and Warehouse Management Systems, optimizing logistics operations and enhancing efficiency.
- Led process automation initiatives, streamlining workflows and improving turnaround times across the logistics arm (CFS).
- Managed the successful implementation of Oracle Fusion for enterprise resource planning, ensuring seamless integration and operational consistency.
- Oversaw innovative technology projects, aligning with organizational goals to achieve significant operational cost savings and efficiency improvements.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver cutting-edge solutions in logistics and supply chain management, driving measurable results.

recommendations: Mark W. Jarvis â€œI have known Harsha continuously since 2010 in a variety of professional roles and reporting relationships. Harsha helped me start Visteon Indiaâ€™s Design Studio as Design Employee #1 and progressed very quickly through creative design management positions of increasing responsibility. And now that Harsha is Studio Head at Initia Design Studio in Pune, India, I have been lucky to support Harshaâ€™s corporate-wide innovation management initiatives. In my experience, Harsha masterfully expresses the following key difference-making skills and attributes: Efficient Design Project Management â€¦ Harsha possesses this rare skill among creative design professionals that blends attention to cost and timing detail, priority management, design insight, and team coaching. Design Thinking â€¦ Harshaâ€™s curiosity-fueled creativity and strategic approach using design thinking principles applied to processes and products creates a culture of productive corporate innovation. Global Focus â€¦ Harsha demonstrates outstanding global team collaboration skills and understanding of local and global trends and markets. Entrepreneurial Risk-Taking â€¦ Harsha uses risk/benefit-based confidence to promote challenging solutions and pursue creative opportunities, applies appropriate persuasion methods, and expertly manages key-stakeholder relationships to achieve corporate results. For these reasons, I give my strongest recommendation to Harsha for a creative design leadership position at a global design-focused firm. â€

Chris Gattis â€œI have worked with Harsha at Visteon and have seen his an amazing talent to develop and lead creative team. Though the strategy and product development phases he resolves business and development roadblocks to create the best solution for the company. I have seen his talent on the front lines of customer programs and critical deliveries and can say he as 100% of what it takes to be design leader. â€

honors_and_awards.title: FutureMaker - Visteon, Class of 2016 & 2017
honors_and_awards.description: To support the technical focus of the company, the leadership team and board of directors initiated the FutureMakers program. This program is designed to award key technical talent that is critical in shaping Visteon's collective future. It is annual grant program, with the FutureMakers class is selected on an annual basis. 30 employees selected globally every year.
